Functions.html#/s:12SmartcarAuth35getOau.name: getOauthCaptureCompletionJavascript(jsonRPCResponseData:)
Functions.html#/s:12SmartcarAuth35getOau.abstract: Generates a String of JS code that is to be evaluated when the Oauth capture activity is finished and we have the response to notify Connect with

Enums/SCMode.html.name: SCMode
Enums/SCMode.html.abstract: Enum to be used with the mode parameter for SmartcarAuth to determine which mode Connect will launch in

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: authUrlBuilder()
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Helper method to generate a SCURLBuilder instance, which then can be used (with various setters) to build an auth URL

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: handleCallback(callbackUrl:)
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Authorization callback function. Verifies that no error occured during the OAuth process and extracts the auth code, state string, and virtualKeyUrl upon success. Invokes the completion function with either the code or an error (and state and/or virtualKeyUrl if included).

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/s:12SmartcarA.name: init(clientId:redirectUri:scope:testMode:mode:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/s:12SmartcarA.abstract: Constructor for SCUrlBuilder. Represents the minimum requirements for an authorization URL.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setForcePrompt(forcePrompt:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Force display of the grant approval dialog in Smartcar Connect.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setMakeBypass(make:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Bypass the brand selector screen to a specified make.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setSingleSelect(singleSelect:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Ensure the user only authorizes a single vehicle.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setSingleSelectVin(vin:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Specify the vin a user can authorize in Smartcar Connect.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setFlags(flags:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Set flags to enable early access features.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setUser(user:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Specify a unique identifier for the vehicle owner to track and aggregate analytics across Connect sessions for each vehicle owner

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: build()
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Build a Smartcar Connect authorization URL string

Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: webView(_:decidePolicyFor:decisionHandler:)
Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Listens to changes in the navigation to determine if the redirect from Connect has happened. If so, call the handleCallback function and close the webview

Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: launchWebView()
Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Launches the webview to begin the Smartcar Connect flow

Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: userContentController(_:didReceive:)
Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Recieves the SmartcarSDK message when the custom JS injected into the webview is called by Connect. Launches the ASWebAuthenticationSession for login with the OEM.

Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@CM@Smartca.name: presentationAnchor(for:)
Classes/OauthCapture.html#/c:@CM@Smartca.abstract: Provides a default window to act as the presentation anchor for the authentication session

Classes/AuthorizationError.html.name: AuthorizationError
Classes/AuthorizationError.html.abstract: Error that gets created when the authorization flow exits with an error.

Classes/OauthCapture.html.name: OauthCapture
Classes/OauthCapture.html.abstract: Class for the OauthCapture that will launch a webview for the specified auth URL, open an ASWebAuthenticationSession for a specified OEM, and process the redirect from Connect

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html.name: SCUrlBuilder
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html.abstract: A builder used for generating Smartcar Connect authorization URLs.

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html.name: SmartcarAuth
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html.abstract: Smartcar Authentication SDK for iOS written in Swift 5.

Classes/VehicleInfo.html.name: VehicleInfo
Classes/VehicleInfo.html.abstract: VehicleInfo class is used to describe the vehicle information that may be returned via query parameters in the case of authentication failure.
